tools.name: Compare-PolicyCompliance
tools.description: Compares local policy on a server against a GPO to verify migration completeness.

CompareType.description: What to compare. Valid values: Firewall, SecurityPolicy, Both. Defaults to Both.

OutputPath.description: Optional file path to save an HTML compliance report.

ComputerName.description: The server to compare local policy from.

tools.name: Copy-FirewallToGPO
tools.description: Copies local firewall rules into a domain GPO. Writes to GPO only, never touches local policy.

GPOName.description:
Name of the GPO to create the firewall rules in. If -CreateGPO is specified and
GPOName is not provided, the name defaults to "Firewall - ServerName - Migrated YYYY-MM-DD".

ProfileFilter.description:
Filter source rules by firewall profile. Valid values: Domain, Private, Public, Any.
Defaults to Any.

EnabledOnly.description: When specified (default), only migrates rules that are currently enabled.

SourceComputer.description: The server to read local firewall rules from.

CreateGPO.description: If specified, creates the GPO if it does not already exist.

tools.name: Copy-SecurityPolicyToGPO
tools.description: Copies local security policy settings into a domain GPO. Writes to GPO only, never touches local policy.

GPOName.description: Name of the GPO to write the security policy settings into.

SourceComputer.description: The server to read local security policy from.

CreateGPO.description: If specified, creates the GPO if it does not already exist.

Categories.description:
Which security policy categories to migrate. Valid values:
SystemAccess, AuditPolicy, UserRights, SecurityOptions, All.
Defaults to All.

tools.name: Get-LocalFirewallPolicy
tools.description: Reads local firewall rules from a server. Never modifies local policy.

ProfileFilter.description:
Filter rules by firewall profile. Valid values: Domain, Private, Public, Any.
Defaults to Any (all profiles).

EnabledOnly.description:
When specified (default), only returns rules that are currently enabled.
Use -EnabledOnly:$false to include disabled rules.

ExportPath.description: Optional file path to save the results as JSON for review before migration.

ComputerName.description:
One or more server names to read firewall rules from. Defaults to localhost.
Accepts pipeline input.

tools.name: Get-LocalSecurityPolicy
tools.description: Reads local security policy settings from a server. Never modifies local policy.

ComputerName.description: One or more server names to read security policy from. Defaults to localhost.

ExportPath.description: Optional file path to save the structured results as JSON for review.
